voice.name: mobile
voice.attack: sayto $N Hey, you're the fiend that attacked me!!!
sayto $N Hey, you're the punk I've been looking for!!!
voice.fight_losing: emote grits $s teeth as $e begins to weaken.
yell $N you bastard!
voice.fight_winning: sneer Let this be a lesson to you!
smirk So you thought you were tough, eh?
yell Kiss my ass, $N!
voice.hunt_openair: say Well SHIT! I need to be able to fly!
voice.hunt_water: say Damn this water! Can anybody help me cross?
voice.hunt_gone: say Damn! My prey is gone!!
voice.hunt_found: say Well, well, well... if it isn't $N!
sayto $N You can run but you can't hide!
voice.hunt_unseen: say I know that jerk $N is around here somewhere!
voice.hunt_taunt: say I'm gonna get that freak $N!
shout You can run but you can't hide, $N you sissy!
shout You better run for the inn, cause I'm coming for you $N!
tell $N You're gonna learn better than to mess with me, $N!
shout One of these days, I'm gonna get a little respect!
Well, looks like I'm gonna hafta teach $N a lesson!
shout Anybody know where that punk $N is?!
shout Now you've pissed me off, $N!
shout I've had it up to HERE with punks like $N!
tell $N Don't worry $N... I'll find you!
shout Looks like I'm gonna have to hunt you down, $N!
tell $N Looks like I'm gonna have to hunt you down, $N!

voice.name: animal
voice.panic: emote lets out a frightened yelp!
voice.hunt_openair: emote growls and sniffs the wind.
voice.hunt_water: emote approaches the edge of the water and whines.

voice.name: archon
voice.taunt: say The powers of good will take you down, servant of evil.
voice.fight_losing: say Your evil shall not prevail!
voice.fight_winning: say It is never too late to repent, evildoer!
voice.hunt_openair: say I will remember this, $N. Beware!
voice.hunt_water: say I will remember this, $N. Beware!
voice.hunt_lost: say I will remember this, $N. Beware!
voice.hunt_unseen: say You remain in the shadow for you fear the light!
voice.hunt_found: yell $N you vile profaner of goodness!

voice.name: elven
voice.attack: say Make peace with your god, for you shall soon meet!
voice.taunt: say By Selene's blade, I shall destroy you!
voice.fight_winning: say Veloth's dark halls await you
say This day shall be your last!
say Your moss covered bones shall rot before I fall!
voice.fight_losing: say Selene preserve me!
say You cannot prevail.
yell My people will avenge me should I fall!
flinch

voice.name: dwarven
voice.attack: say I'll crush you like Alron's hammer!
voice.taunt: say I'll rip yer head off you bleedin' oaf!
voice.fight_winning: cackle $N
say I'll murder you, $N!
voice.fight_losing: say My clan will see you dead!
say I'll see you in hell, you dog!
say You'll never destroy us all!
say You're stronger than you look, $N.

voice.name: halfling
voice.attack: say I'll be show'n you my fist then!
say You're a plucky bugger aren't ya.

voice.name: good_knight
voice.fight_winning: say Now ye will see true justice.
say Thine blood shall honor the gods.
say Make ready to meet thy maker, knave!
say Thy fell strength shall amount to naught!
say Burn the heretic!
say Feel the judgment of Alron, $N
say Prepare to meet thy doom!
voice.fight_losing: say Alron, preserve me!
say Grant me strength mine Lord!
say I applaud thine strength.
say Velroth take you to his darkest hell!
say Burn in the depths of the Abyss!
say Alron, do not desert me!

voice.name: evil_knight
voice.attack: sayto $N Your soul now belongs to Veloth
voice.fight_winning: say I will consume your soul!
scream
say Can you feel the dark lord waiting for you?
voice.fight_losing: say Veloth, do not forsake me!

voice.name: good_cleric
voice.fight_winning: say Guiharia will judge your soul.
say My soul knows its destination, does yours?
say May the lady of light cast you into shade.
voice.fight_losing: say You cannot defeat me.
say My mistress will guard my soul.
say Guiharia, be my strength!
say Why hast thou forsaken me, my mistress?

voice.name: mage
voice.attack: say You dare disturb my studies?
voice.fight_winning: say Behold my powers!
say You will rue the day you trifled with me!
say My ruinous powers will destroy you.
say Pathetic creature, feel my wrath!
voice.fight_losing: say How are you defeating me?
say You must know some secret I haven't gleaned.
